scenes.background: You told Bob you trust Monicas abilities.
scenes.description: Bob seemed skeptical. Are you sure I can handle this alone?

options.text: Absolutely, I believe in you. You've got this.
options.analysis: You expressed strong confidence and motivation, showing empathy. However, self-regulation could be improved as you didn't address the potential risks.

options.text: I think you're capable, but I'll stay available just in case.
options.analysis: You balanced support with readiness to assist, showing good perception and social skills. Motivation was lower, as you didn't fully commit to either side.

options.text: If you're not confident, let's collaborate on this.
options.analysis: You offered a collaborative approach, showing strong perception and balanced empathy. Social skills were lower as you didn't fully empower Monica.
